articles.description: Two new species of pygmy squid have been discovered off Okinawa and named after mythical creatures.
articles.content: Two new species of pygmy squid have been found in the subtropical waters of a Japanese island. These cephalopods, which are smaller than paper clips, find refuge in the coral beds and seagrass fields… [+2501 chars]
